item.description: Zen Bar has been voted top 3 in the Hartford Advocate's Reader's Poll for Best in Karaoke in all of Connecticut. Zen Bar is proud of not only being an amazing venue for entertainment, but they're as proud of their fantastic food menu. Chef Michael Torres takes amazing pride in serving up the best food in the area and looking forward to seeing you. Zen Bar serves up over 200 martinis and many other specialty drinks and we have over 65 varieties of beers for you to choose from.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Karaoke and Eats at Zen Bar
